entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
